title: Queue dodging, sometimes its necessary.
body:
Sometimes a game can be lost in champion select, when you see your team raging harshly before the match even begins in champ select or serious trolling before the match even begins its better to dodge than continue to play.  

I would like a system where you can dodge a game whilst reporting and blocking someone, that logs the chat history in the champ select menu and dodging in this way doesn't allow you to go up above 5 min q dodge timer.

5 mins because it will be abused if it had no timer, and also if people are caught abusing this system IE the chat doesn't support the report, they lose it PERMANENTLY, forever period never again to be used.
Blocking player because you don't want to queue with them again for the reason u reported them in the first place, If you unblock them after it invalidates your report and disables the feature for a month or so, And you cant reuse this on the same person after you have unblocked them. 
(Basically make damn sure you are serious about using this its not to be taken lightly its to remove trolls in champion select and that's all, its not to dodge because you don't like the team composition.)

I'm tired of having to continually dodge games due to insanely toxic players in champion select. I am open to new strategies etc and enjoy them when they pay off, learn when they don't but i wont join a game that has someone destroying any hope of victory for 35+ mins because they wont surrender and drag on games i would rather wait the timer, but i don't also like being punished when for some reason you end up in queue with the same person or another toxic player.

replies.body: That amazing feeling when you get back to back lobbies that need to be dodged (I do not say "need" lightly, I'm talking fresh lvl 30 in their first ranked picking AP Diana with smite for an ADC, followed by a raging Tyler1 wannabe trying to play Draven jg with no smite) Only to have my attempts at clinging onto my precious LP shredded by a -3 and -15 LP punishment, as well as a total of 20 mins ban. Even leaving the queue till the final seconds of pre game because god forbid the troll or anyone else take that LP loss... A system that allows you to justify, or at least report those people would be an absolute god send

I dodged my first match in ranked and i lost 10 LP and got a 30 min ban all because someone wanted to go AP wukong mid. how was i punished that hard for saving a bunch of people their LP  and it was my first dodge shouldnt it be -3 LP and 5 min ban...?

I had a similar dilemma a few weeks ago. It was a ranked game, and I was second pick zed. About a minute into champ select, One of my teammates recognised someone else in my team, and asked if it was the person in their last game. But no, it wasn't just a simple question like that. It started with simple, then went to "oh, that shitty thresh, please don't play that again!", and that person would reply with something toxic. I was so happy when the person who first asked the question said he would dodge, and did, because I knew this game was a loss of he didn't.

I was close to dodging myself, but was in promos and didn't want to risk it...

See ive been saying this for ages why should players be punished because of others actions...
But in all seriousness this will never be done.....
They have time even banning players for repeated violations like feeding so this would never get in..
they're releasing the new champ select in the next patch, but unfortunately thats not until next year
There needs to be a way to report players at any time, not just in the after game. Too many times I have been so pissed at someone I just wanted to get away from them and forget to hit report.

I agree with this, yet during game may be a bad idea for it takes a while to write an accurate report.
Maybe flagging them for report so after game it comes up with a dialog to fill out about that person.

Looks like you've given this a lot of thought, great work!

I'd very much like to see this implemented.
Fully agree, oceana needs to the purged of so many toxic players.
